commit message: Merge branch 'develop' into issue/1338-remove-save-dilog-posteditor
code style

Faster processing of note comment string at the cost of not showing emoji characters in the list view.

Removed mComment member and getCommentBody() since those were note being used any longer.

Limit length of mCommentPreview to improve scrolling performance.

Merge branch 'develop' into issue/1338-remove-save-dilog-posteditor
replace auto save Handler by a Timer (run the autosave on its own Thread)
push AUTOSAVE_INTERVAL to 10 seconds

- Fix an issue where Jetpack blogs with NO dot_com credentials cannot retrieve stats on the first loading after a successful dot_com login.
- Fix an issue where dismissing the JetPack login popover result in an unfriendly toast.
Replacing notification icon with a new, single ring icon. Looks nice ;)
A more different icon :)

Show 'UPDATE' text for the save button when editing an uploaded post.

Button still works the same way as it did before for local drafts.

Fixes #1422
Renaming update_location string to update_verb to make more contextual sense.
Make one db post save call instead of two when saving the post.
Added a null check for the post object in savePost(), just in case.

Set save button to 'Schedule' if the PostStatus is scheduled.

Renamed the save methods in the fragments to 'update' since they are only updating the post object now.
Use a monitor when accessing mServiceBlogId
Use synchronized getter/setter for mServiceBlogId
